Scenario: Displaced person receives support from domestic violence network
    Given Maria is recovering from domestic violence trauma
    When she joins a domestic violence survivor support affinity network
    And the network provides peer support and resources
    Then she connects with others who understand her experience
    And she receives practical support for rebuilding her life
    And the network helps her access legal aid and counseling
    And she finds strength and healing through community support
    And her safety is maintained through privacy protections
